tuv.seg: Container First
容器优先

Quarkus tailors your application for GraalVM and HotSpot. Amazingly fast boot time, incredibly low RSS memory (not just heap size!) offering near instant scale up and high density memory utilization in container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes. We use a technique we call compile time boot. Learn more.
Quarkus 为 GraalVM 和 HotSpot 量身定制用程序。启动超快，内存极低（不仅是堆大小！）在容器编排平台（如Kubernetes）中提供了近乎即时的向上扩展和高密度的内存利用率。我们使用一种称为编译时启动技术。 了解更多
Best of Breed Libraries and Standards
优秀的类库及标准件
Contributing
贡献

Quarkus is an Open Source project licensed under the Apache License version 2.0. First and foremost, it is an open community where contributions, ideas and discussions are done in the open and contributors are welcome. Let’s join forces in building the future of Java applications.
Quarkus 是一个开源项目，使用 Apache License version 2.0 许可协议. 最重要的是这是一个开放的社区，欢迎贡献者公开进行贡献、想法和讨论。让我们一起来构建 Java 应用的未来。
Roadmap
路线图
Read about the community plans for the future. Here is our current roadmap. This is driven by the community, come and tell us what your needs are.
了解社区未来计划. 这是 我们当前的路线图. 这是由社区驱动的，来吧告诉我们什么是 你 想要的.
Code and Issue Tracker
代码及问题跟踪
The source code is hosted on GitHub. If you need to report a bug or request a new feature, look for a similar one on our GitHub issue tracker. If you don’t find any, create a new issue.
源代码托管在 GitHub. 如果需要提交 bug 或者提交功能建议，先在 GitHub issue tracker找找看有没类似的. 没有的话, 创建一个新的 issue.
Write QuickStart Guides
编写快速开始指南
There are always new users trying to get started quickly. Share your experience with everyone by writing a Quickstart and submitting it for peer review.
总有一些新用户试图快速入门。通过写一个快速入门与大家分享你的经验并提交给同行评审。
Write New Extensions
写新的 Extensions
Follow Quarkus on Twitter
关注 Quarkus Twitter
Need More Than Community Support?
需要社区外的支持？
If you require a higher level of support, you have options.
如果你需要更高级的支持，有一些选择。
Enterprise support provided by Red Hat for the product.
Red Hat 为产品提供的企业支持。
You need an IDE like IntelliJ IDEA, Eclipse, VSCode or even Vim or Emacs!
你需要一个 IDE 如 IntelliJ IDEA, Eclipse, VSCode 或者 Vim 、 Emacs!
You need a a JDK {{ site.data.versions.jdk }} (any distribution)
你需要 JDK {{ site.data.versions.jdk }} (any distribution)
Optionally get GraalVM {{ site.data.versions.graalvm }} for native compilation
可选项 GraalVM {{ site.data.versions.graalvm }} 用于原生编译
You need Apache Maven {{ site.data.versions.maven }}
你需要 Apache Maven {{ site.data.versions.maven }}
or Gradle
或 Gradle
Start Coding with Quarkus {{ site.data.versions.quarkus.version }} [announce|changelog]
开始编码 用 Quarkus {{ site.data.versions.quarkus.version }} [announce|changelog]
QUARKUS 2.0 IS HERE!
QUARKUS 2.0 来了！
Quarkus 2.0 continues the mission of making Java the preferred framework for Kubernetes-native development with new developer tools and improved performance.
Quarkus 2.0 继续执行使命，即通过新的开发人员工具和改进的性能，使 Java 成为 Kubernetes 原生开发的首选框架。
A Kubernetes Native Java stack tailored for OpenJDK HotSpot and GraalVM, crafted from the best of breed Java libraries and standards.
专为 OpenJDK HotSpot 及 GraalVM 量身定制的原生 Kubernetes Java 开发栈，采用最佳 Java 库和标准精制而成。
Get Started with Quarkus
Quarkus 入门
Now Available
现可用
More Information
更多信息
Feedback and Help
反馈和帮助
For usage questions, we recommend to:
对于使用问题，我们建议：
Ask on Stack Overflow with the quarkus tag
在 Stack Overflow 带上 quarkus 标签 提问
Chat using Zulip (#users stream)
用 Zulip 交谈 (#users stream)
For questions related to the development of Quarkus:
对于 Quarkus 开发相关问题：
The quarkus-dev Google Groups
quarkus-dev Google Groups
Chat using Zulip (#dev stream)
用 Zulip 交流 (#dev stream)
Your help is more than welcome! Don’t hesitate to join the crowd.
欢迎你的帮助！来吧不要犹豫。
Join the Quarkus Community
加入 Quarkus 社区
Check out our GitHub for details on reporting issues and the process for submitting pull requests.
报告问题及处理 pul request 的详细信息请查看 GitHub .
Every contribution is valuable. It can be a bug report, an example application, a feature request, a fix in the documentation or just feedback.
任何贡献都是有价值的。比如提交一个 bug 、写个示例代码、功能提议、文档修正或只是反馈。
Developer Joy
开发乐趣
A cohesive platform for optimized developer joy:
一个让开发者更开心的平台:
Unified configuration
统一配置
Zero config, live reload in the blink of an eye
零配置，瞬间重新加载
No hassle native executable generation
简单生成可执行文件
Learn more
了解更多
Getting Help from the Community
获取社区帮助
Documentation
文档
We have a lot of documentation. Be sure to check our Getting started page, and all our guides. Also check out our FAQ section and Quarkus Tips Playlist
我们有很多文档. 看下入门, 还有所有 指南. 还可以看下 FAQ 及 Quarkus Tips Playlist
Ask your questions on Stack Overflow. After the documentation, it’s probably the best place to look for answers. We actively monitor the Quarkus tag.
在 Stack Overflow 提问. 除本文档外，那里可能是寻找答案的最佳地点. 我们会关注 Quarkus tag.
Live Chat
在线交谈
If you prefer live chat with the developers, we have a Zulip chat where we all hang out.
如果你更喜欢与开发者交谈，我们有一个闲聊的 Zulip chat.
Development Mailing List
开发邮件列表
We also have a dedicated mailing list to discuss the development of Quarkus. Join the group via email or by visiting the quarkus-dev Google Groups page.
我们也有个专门的邮件列表用于讨论 Quarkus 开发. 通过 email 加入此邮件组或访问 quarkus-dev Google Groups page.
This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at [jekyllrb.com](https://jekyllrb.com/)
这是基于 Jekyll 主题的. 你可以在 [jekyllrb.com](https://jekyllrb.com/) 找到关于定制 Jekyll 主题的更多信息 , 以及 Jekyll 基本使用的文档
You can find the source code for Minima at GitHub: [jekyll][jekyll-organization] / [minima](https://github.com/jekyll/minima)
可以在 GitHub: [jekyll][jekyll-organization] 找到 Minima 源代码 / [minima](https://github.com/jekyll/minima)
You can find the source code for Jekyll at GitHub: [jekyll][jekyll-organization] / [jekyll](https://github.com/jekyll/jekyll)
可以在 GitHub: [jekyll][jekyll-organization] 找到 Jekyll 源代码 / [jekyll](https://github.com/jekyll/jekyll)
